channel.title: ® Runique ~ Regulated Gambling | Full Slayer | Hunger Games | Alot More
channel.description:
[FONT=Comic Sans MS][CENTER][SIZE=4]Runique[/SIZE]
Runique is a non-profit rsps which was funded in September 21, 2013. Non-profit means any and all money donated [I]to[/I] the server will be used [I]for[/I] the server - paying developers, buying data for our client [better textures, maps we might need, etc] and paying for the vps to maintain a smooth and lag-free experience.
We went through a long [B]Beta[/B] period to ensure everything was as enjoyable and smooth as possible; although our game is as bug free as we might think, every game has bugs, but with help from the community we can patch these up as quickly as possible, this meaning you reporting either in-game (if an administrator has the opportunity to personally speak with either one person or a small group of people - we won't be able to pay much attention with too much spam!) or reporting through the forums' bug section (recommended).
Our goal on Runique is to have major aspects that RuneScape had Pre-EoC, which means emulating content such as skills and minigames as close as possible to RuneScape. Although emulating RuneScape, we also add our own custom content to keep everyone entertained!
You can take a look at our official Welcome Guide here: [url=http://community.runique.org/index.php?/topic/121-welcome-to-runique/]Welcome to Runique! - Knowledge Base - Runique[/url]
[SIZE=4]Links[/SIZE]
[url=http://runique.org]Runique | Home[/url] [URL=http://"http://community.runique.org/"]Runique | Forums[/URL] [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/227915652/Runique-auto-updater.jar]Auto-Updating Launcher[/url] [url=http://runique.org/webclient.html]WebClient[/url] [/CENTER]
[CENTER][SIZE=4]Media[/SIZE]
[spoiler="Media"]
• Runique counts with its own Update-Server to allow anyone to play almost instantly!
[spoiler="Pictures"][img]http://puu.sh/9RPHQ/7976828880.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/9RPUj/a37657b4c1.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/9RQ1q/e9ca18d4b4.png[/img][/spoiler]
• We have up to 4 different game modes to attempt to please everyone's game play choice. Of course the harder the game-mode the more rewards/benefits you will receive throughout the game!
[spoiler="Pictures"][img]http://puu.sh/9RGXA/59b1b8be2e.png[/img][/spoiler]
• Runique counts on a new and better-looking home!
[spoiler="Pictures"][img]http://puu.sh/9WjpD/629d76dfae.png[/img][/spoiler]
• Another one of our goal's is to make gameplay as customizable as possible, this varying from options such as gameframe, to x10 hits (not a fake number), to even allowing others to see your game mode title next to your name (chatbox and right click menu).
[spoiler="Pictures"][img]http://puu.sh/9RH9b/e9f467149d.png[/img][/spoiler]
• To maintain our uniqueness and also help us make more teleports without an ugly and overused dialogue system and avoiding client updates every time we want a new interface teleport; we have come up with a system to achieve this by using "key combinations" to teleport around in designated areas. And also the ability to store your own quick combinations to your most travelled teleport!
[spoiler="Pictures"][img]http://puu.sh/9RR0X/6c34e445a9.png[/img][/spoiler]
• Since a lot of people enjoy gambling, our latest (big) update includes our very own and unique regulated gambling system that allows players their favorite gambling games without the risk of being scammed by other players
[spoiler="Pictures"][img]http://i.imgur.com/ntr1cD3.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/TA6dMPV.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/yZLwFwq.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ApoJXBP.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ZRSXRmz.png[/img][/spoiler]
• Also taking into account that a lot of skills don't benefit players at all without causing major inflation (too much gold from the typical skill: thieving), we have added a feature which gives player's money for skilling depending on a combination of the skill, the item being harvested and the player's game mode
[spoiler="Pictures"][img]http://i.imgur.com/pJTNyMK.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/X1VtmyQ.png[/img][/spoiler]
• We also target players who like new and unique content such as mini games; which is why we will be making these types of mini games such as our already created Hunger Games spin-off. It is currently playable, but not even half way finished with all of the ideas we have thought of (which were paused to continue development on other things)
[spoiler="Pictures"][img]http://i.imgur.com/ize71WS.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Sdrcm7o.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/z58Kb1m.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/YC1ObdE.png[/img][/spoiler]
• Here are some miscellaneous pictures of Runique!
[spoiler="Pictures"][img]http://puu.sh/9VPJF/909597485a.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/a9N2R/737ed84984.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/9RQPt/24bf29b38f.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/9RQXC/ac8853c6fc.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/9RQIi/24a94c781b.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/9RQDx/a080edf4b0.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/tte05TK.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/0TJdkTN.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/PkmHuSx.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/9UJIt/0957f049ad.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/9UIbP/4206c32a23.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/9UIcY/4a2b10743f.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/9UIeI/02540f73e2.png[/img] [/spoiler] [/spoiler]
[spoiler="GIF"]
• Summoning contains everything 100% from training to the actual summoning of familiars including BoB, Renewing, Calling, [B]every[/B] familiar scroll working 100% (no cheap fixes/replacements)
[spoiler="Media"][img]http://puu.sh/9SrRe/e5d59c9377.gif[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/9SrZu/0656307b00.gif][/img] [img]http://puu.sh/9Ss8Z/fb760823a6.gif[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/9SsfE/79b553837d.gif[/img] [/spoiler] [/spoiler]
Banners & Pictures
[spoiler="Spoiler"] [img]http://runique.org/runique.gif[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/9T64i/c078c8ffce.gif[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/9SrFL/1cbd7d1876.gif[/img]
Player-Submitted Banners:
[spoiler="Banners"][img]http://i.imgur.com/DKo39dv.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/2peSpEW.png[/img][/spoiler] [/spoiler] [/center]

item.dc:creator: @Kcool32 Kcool32
item.description:
@Kcool32 wrote:

We have switched homes to cater to those players that think our home was “too custom” and had problems with it and said they didn’t get how to play. It was a difficult decision, but we decided to switch over to the 100% original, never used before, highly innovative: Edgeville

edit: for now the webclient [I][COLOR="#FF0000"]does not[/COLOR][/I] work, it will link to the old vps

[spoiler=“Picture”][/spoiler]

Read full topic

item.title: ® Runique ~ Regulated Gambling | Full Slayer | Hunger Games | Alot More
item.dc:creator: @relexlawl relexlawl
item.description:
@relexlawl wrote:

Had issues with our old vps, it randomly went offline for no reason…We have switched over to one of our previous vps companies Game Server Rentals and Hosting :: Home :: NFOservers and will see how they work out again.

Fixed some problems we were running into with the new clipping checks for object clicking (since someone was showing how easily they could spawn in ores, trees, etc and making it appear for everyone :p) that didn’t recognize some of the objects that actually existed.

Read full topic
